name: GLKEffectPropertyFog
desc: Fog drawing information for use in GLKit rendering effects.

items.name: var enabled: GLboolean
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether fog is applied to the fragment color.

items.name: var mode: GLint
items.desc: The algorithm used to compute the density of the fog applied to the fragment color.

items.name: var color: GLKVector4
items.desc: The color of the fog at maximum density.

items.name: var density: GLfloat
items.desc: The rate at which the fog exponent increases.

items.name: var start: GLfloat
items.desc: The minimum distance in eye coordinates before fog is applied to the fragment color.

items.name: var end: GLfloat
items.desc: The distance in eye coordinates where fog completely covers the color fragment.

items.name: enum GLKFogMode
items.desc: A mode that describes how the fog component is calculated for the fragment.
